description: This file provides a service layer for managing time entries, including functions to list, create, update, delete, and validate time entry data, utilizing Supabase as the backend data store.

methods.name: getFeatureFlags
methods.description: Reads feature flags from environment variables, supporting JSON or CSV formats, and provides default values based on Supabase configuration.

methods.name: mapRow
methods.description: Maps a database row to a UI-friendly shape for time entries.

methods.name: isMissingTable
methods.description: Detects if an error indicates a missing database table or schema.

methods.name: listMyTimeEntries
methods.description: Fetches a list of time entries for a specific user, ordered by date descending.

methods.name: createTimeEntry
methods.description: Creates a new time entry record for the current user.

methods.name: updateTimeEntry
methods.description: Updates an existing time entry identified by ID with provided patch data.

methods.name: deleteTimeEntry
methods.description: Deletes a time entry by ID for the current user.

methods.name: validateEntryFields
methods.description: Performs minimal validation on time entry input fields, returning errors and validity status.
